alert.note: Alert for Deuel; Garden; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 9:43PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Keith, south central Garden and Deuel Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 843 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Oshkosh to 6 miles east of Chappell to near Ovid. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chappell, Big Springs, Barton, Goldeneye State Wildlife Management Area, Mount Vernon and Windlass Hill. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 81 and 110. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 300 AM MDT for southwestern Nebraska.
